PERSONA:
joseph is a 68-year-old married man living in a non-metropolitan area in the east south central region of the south. he was born and raised in the united states, and his race is white non-hispanic. joseph completed high school but did not pursue further education.

joseph is a devout roman catholic, attending religious services a few times a year. although he is not a born-again or evangelical christian, his faith plays an important role in his life.

politically, joseph aligns himself with the democratic party and considers himself a moderate or conservative democrat. despite his moderate views, he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously.

joseph comes from a middle-income family, earning less than $30,000 annually. despite his modest income, he finds time to engage in volunteer work, giving back to his community.

in his free time, joseph enjoys spending time with his wife and engaging in activities that do not require frequent internet use. he values his roots in the south and the tight-knit community he has been a part of for most of his life.
